title: Playing with fire
creator_contributor_role: National Fire Protection Association. Public Affairs Division, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Dwellings - Fires and fire prevention
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Home accidents - Prevention
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Home accidents
description: Two children take some matches from home and set fire to a truck, which in the process of exploding burns them both badly. A doctor explains that dangers should be explained to children as so often in the domestic situation children are put at risk when with care and commonsense these can be avoided.
